channel.title: Educational Services on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Educational Services on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Benesse Logo Benesse Corporation is a Japanese company which focuses on correspondence education and publishing. Based in Okayama-City, it is the parent company of Berlitz Language Schools, which in turn is the parent company of ELS Language Centers. Benesse is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Source
You can download theBenesselogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Benesse
item.description: Benesse Corporation is a Japanese company which focuses on correspondence education and publishing. Based in Okayama-City, it is the parent company of Berlitz Language Schools, which in turn is the parent company of ELS Language Centers. Benesse is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Source
